    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public static <E> boolean contains(E needle,
                   E[] haystack)
        Search for the specified Object in the array given.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Object to search for in the array.
        haystack - The array to search for the Object in.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the Object is in the array.

      • occurrences

        public static <E> int occurrences(E needle,
                  E[] haystack)
        Calculate how many occurrences of the specified Object are in the array given.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Object to search for.
        haystack - The array to search for the Object in.
        Returns:
        The amount of occurrences of the Object that are in the array.

      • indexOf

        public static <E> int indexOf(E needle,
              E[] haystack)
        Calculate the first index of the Object in the given array. If the Object does not exist in the array, this method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Object to get the index of in the array.
        haystack - The array to search for the Object in.
        Returns:
        The first index of the Object in the array.

      • indexOf

        public static <E> int indexOf(E needle,
              E[] haystack,
              int startIndex)
        Calculate the first index of the Object in the given array at, or after the startIndex. If the Object does not exist in the array at, or after the startIndex, this method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Object to get the index of in the array.
        haystack - The array to search for the Object in.
        startIndex - The index in the array to start looking for the Object at.
        Returns:
        The first index of the Object in the array at, or after the start index.

      • lastIndexOf

        public static <E> int lastIndexOf(E needle,
                  E[] haystack)
        Calculate the last index of the Object in the given array. If the Object does not exist in the array, this method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Object to get the index of in the array.
        haystack - The array to search for the Object in.
        Returns:
        The last index of the Object in the array.

      • lastIndexOf

        public static <E> int lastIndexOf(E needle,
                  E[] haystack,
                  int startIndex)
        Calculate the first index of the Object in the given array at, or before the startIndex. If the Object does not exist in the array at, or before the startIndex, this method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Object to get the index of in the array.
        haystack - The array to search for the Object in.
        startIndex - The index in the array to start looking for the Object at.
        Returns:
        The last index of the Object in the array at, or before the start index.
